title: 51st: Why Statehood, Why Now?
dc:creator: Mikaela Lefrak
description: Three major events in 2020 bring D.C.'s lack of representation into the spotlight: the coronavirus pandemic, protests near the White House against police brutality, and a historic statehood vote in Congress. This is the first episode of 51st, from WAMU's What's With Washington.
